certs-mgmt
**********


Description
===========

CLI for managing certificates.


Available Commands
==================

* association

  * get

  * list

* ca-bundle

  * change-compartment

  * create

  * delete

  * get

  * list

  * update

* certificate

  * cancel-deletion

  * change-compartment

  * create-by-importing-config

  * create-certificate-issued-by-internal-ca

  * create-certificate-managed-externally-issued-by-internal-ca

  * get

  * list

  * schedule-deletion

  * update

  * update-certificate-by-importing-config-details

  * update-certificate-managed-externally

  * update-certificate-managed-internally

* certificate-authority

  * cancel-deletion

  * change-compartment

  * create-root-ca-by-generating-config-details

  * create-root-ca-managed-externally

  * create-subordinate-ca-issued-by-internal-ca

  * create-subordinate-ca-managed-internally-issued-by-external-ca

  * get

  * list

  * schedule-deletion

  * update-root-ca-by-generating-config-details

  * update-root-ca-managed-externally

  * update-subordinate-ca-issued-by-internal-ca

  * update-subordinate-ca-managed-internally-issued-by-external-ca

* certificate-authority-version

  * cancel-deletion

  * get

  * list

  * revoke

  * schedule-deletion

* certificate-version

  * cancel-deletion

  * get

  * list

  * revoke

  * schedule-deletion
